value.title: Researchers build working robot based on AI’s design

value.title: Could a robot win a Grammy? AI music is eligible — sort of
value.excerpt: Hold the (gramo)phone: Artificial intelligence-generated music is eligible for Grammy Awards — err, kind of. The Recording Academy announced sweeping changes Friday to music’s biggest night, including that it will allow entries that use AI, as long as there is a “meaningful” and “relevant” human component.
